title: Slayer task/Black demons

properties.name: description
properties.value:
Black demons can be assigned as slayer task at 80 combat level by various slayer masters. They can be found in a variety dungeons around Gielinor. Black demons can be easily killed by safe points attacking ranged or magic, or using melee with prayer of protect from melee.
As demons, they have high combat stats but rather low Defence for their level. They are weak to demonbane weapons.

Black demon

Krystilia100-150

Konar120-170
Nieve120-185
Duradel130-200
Advanced data
Icon IDNo

Black demons can be assigned as slayer task at 80 combat level by various slayer masters. They can be found in a variety dungeons around Gielinor. Black demons can be easily killed by safe points attacking ranged or magic, or using melee with prayer of protect from melee. As demons, they have high combat stats but rather low Defence for their level. They are weak to demonbane weapons.

Contents

  • 1 Slayer Unlocks
  • 2 Monster Variants
  • 3 Location Comparison
  • 4 Exceptions

Slayer Unlocks[edit | edit source]

Main article: Slayer reward point
Unlock Points cost Notes
It's dark in here 100 Number of black demons assigned is increased to 200-250.

Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

Monster Combat level Slayer XP Locations Notes
Black demon 172 157
  • Brimhaven Dungeon
  • Catacombs of Kourend
  • Chasm of Fire (Bottom Level)
  • Edgeville Dungeon (Wilderness)
  • Taverley Dungeon
  • Wilderness Slayer Cave
  • Standard Black demon, found in various locations around Gielinor.
Demonic gorilla 275 408.5
  • Crash Site Cavern
  • Stronger Black demon variant found in the deep of Crash Site Cavern.
Balfrug Kreeyath 151 161
  • Zamorak Fortress, God Wars Dungeon
  • Balfrug Kreeyath is a three-faced black demon and one of K'ril Tsutsaroth's bodyguards
Skotizo 321 618.5
  • Catacombs of Kourend
  • Beneath the catacombs lurks Skotizo, a demi-boss whose lair requires the use of a dark totem to enter
  • For more information on fighting Skotizo, see Skotizo/Strategies
Porazdir 235 376
  • During Mage Arena II
  • Plays a part in the Mage Arena II miniquest, or when reobtaining an imbued zamorak cape after completing the miniquest.
Kolodion(Final form) 112 107
  • During Mage Arena I
  • The fourth form of Kolodion

Location Comparison[edit | edit source]

Location Maplink Amount Multicombat Cannonable Safespottable Notes
Brimhaven Dungeon 4 No Yes Yes
  • Safespot near agility pipe allows you to cannon 2-3 of the 4 demons
Catacombs of Kourend 4 Yes No Yes
  • Killing Black demons here also gives access to Ancient shards and Dark totem pieces as bonus drops.
Chasm of Fire (Bottom level) 17 No Yes Yes
  • Safespot by stalagmites on the far north, toward the center of the map
  • Players can also safespot in the center of the bottom level, by the Voice of Yama
Crash Site Cavern 27 No No No
Edgeville Dungeon 3 No Yes Yes
  • Located in level 5 Wilderness
Taverley Dungeon 24 No Yes Yes
Wilderness Slayer Cave 4 Yes Yes Yes
  • Multicombat area and high-risk player killing makes this a very dangerous location.

Exceptions[edit | edit source]

  • The black demon defeated during The Grand Tree can be killed again in the Nightmare Zone after the mission has been completed. Killing black demons in the Nightmare Zone will count as a kill for a Slayer task.
  • Kolodion can only be killed once during the mage arena

Black demons can be assigned as [[slayer task]] at 80 [[combat]] level by various [[slayer masters]]. They can be found in a variety dungeons around Gielinor. Black demons can be easily killed by safe points attacking [[ranged]] or [[magic]], or using [[melee]] with [[prayer]] of [[protect from melee]].
As demons, they have high combat stats but rather low [[Defence]] for their level. They are weak to [[demonbane weapons]].

== Exceptions ==

*The black demon defeated during The Grand Tree can be killed again in the Nightmare Zone after the mission has been completed. Killing black demons in the Nightmare Zone will count as a kill for a Slayer task.
*Kolodion can only be killed once during the mage arena
